title: Roasted vegetable baguettines
ingredients: ['2 red peppers, quartered lengthways and seeded', '4 short French sticks or baguettines, about 125 g (4½ oz) each, halved horizontally', '1 red onion, cut into small wedges', '2 large courgettes, about 340 g (12 oz) in total, sliced diagonally', '2–3 garlic cloves, chopped (optional)', '3 sprigs of fresh rosemary', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '150 g (5 1/2 oz) feta cheese', 'salt and pepper']
